message.multiRequestSuccess: Your request has been successfully sent, you can send another request.
message.singleRequestSuccess: Your request has been successfully sent.

activateSmsDialog.text: You will need a Sender ID in order to send SMS campaigns, please request a sender ID registration to start sending campaigns.

confirmRequestDialog.title: Confirm Request
confirmRequestDialog.text: Are you sure you want to send this Sender ID request?

activateListingDialog.title: Activate
activateListingDialog.text: Are you sure you want to activate this sender ID on this country?

deactivateListingDialog.title: Deactivate
deactivateListingDialog.text: Are you sure you want to deactivate the sender ID. You will no longer be able to use it in your campaigs. This action will lead to failing launched campiagns messages and suspending scheduled campaigns using the desired deactivated sender ID

emptyView.title: You don't have sender ID yet
emptyView.text: Request a Sender ID in order to start sending you're campaigns
